comments:
While verifying bug 90957 on wst integration build I20050713
(http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/webtools/downloads/drops/I-I20050713-200507130840/wtp-I20050713.zip),
simple New -> Dynamic Web Project throws exception on my workstation.

Steps to reproduce:
1. New -> Dynamic Web Project..
2. Give project name
3. Hit Finish / OK
Project is created.
Then get Wizard Error dialog: An error has occurred when New Dynamic Web Project
finished.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 103611 ***

look related to the Taglb Index failing to read in a web.xml file and *aren't*
in any way related to bug 103611.
